channel.title: How do i add items from my server to my client?
channel.description: topic pretty much sums it up and if u dont no how to then give me a link to a source that works with galkons client base thnx

item.title: How do i add items from my server to my client?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

If you mean replacing null’s.
Find the Model For the item you wish to replace, then, open you’re Class8.java, and search for.

something like.

if(i == 14529) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 920; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 27210; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 24014; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 8070; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 19788; class8.anInt174 = 13009; class8.anInt181 = 789; class8.anInt190 = 194; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt198 = 1784; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -35; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 10090; class8.anInt200 = 10091; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Guthix coif"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Guthix blessed dragonhide coif.".getBytes(); }
And, basically work off their.
